title: Redundant Skins
body:
I feel that Slayer Jinx is redundant. It, to be blunt, is not a new thematic for Jinx. Sure, there's a 'zombie killer' thing going on, but in comparison to Firecracker Jinx or Mafia Jinx, it's basically just 'diffferently colored Jinx'. She's already kinda got the 'genius with spare parts' thing going on. Compare this to Pantheon, whose Slayer skin is an entirely different thematic, Slayer Jinx is just kinda...expected.

I have the same problem with Captain Fortune; it should, by all accounts, by her base skin with her VU. Or for that various Udyr skins; he has three, and the two most recent ones are basically just his base with better particles. At least Captain GP has a different VO in comparison to normal GP.

replies.body:
Meanwhile {{champion:268}} has 1 skin while ekko just got a brand new one.... But nerfs are needed over skins amarite? 

But lich azir wouldn't be awesome or anything http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news-tr/2014-November/Zombileme/007Penguin.jpg
